translation: They who follow this immortal Dharma, endowed with faith and regarding Me as their supreme goal, are exceedingly dear to Me.
commentary: 12.20 Ye who? You indeed? Dharmyaamritam immortal Dharma (Law)? This is this? as declared (above)? worship follow? faithful endowed with faith? Matparamah regarding Me as their Supreme? devotees devotees? And they? Very exceedingly? Me to Me? Priyah dear.Commentary The Blessed Lord has in this verse given a description of His excellent devotee.Amrita Dharma Amrita is the lifegiving nectar. Dharma
